title: Make cost ceiling off by default
description:
Most users run ticker on Claude subscription where cost is irrelevant. Changes needed:

1. Set DefaultMaxCost to 0 (disabled) in engine.go
2. When maxCost is 0/disabled, skip cost budget checks
3. Update status pane to show just 'Cost: $X.XX' without target when disabled
4. Update completion modal similarly
5. Keep --max-cost flag for users who want to set a limit

Current default of $20 causes unnecessary stops for subscription users.
closed_reason: Set DefaultMaxCost to 0 (disabled by default). Removed default application in Run(), updated CLI flag default from 20.0 to 0 with updated help text, fixed test assertion. Budget tracker already handles MaxCost=0 as unlimited, TUI already shows just cost without target when maxCost=0.
